component.name: Image Resizer
component.summary: Resize images with support for multiple input and output formats

description.p: Image Resizer is a user-friendly application designed to help you resize images quickly and easily. It features a modern dark theme interface and supports a wide range of formats.
The application includes the following key features:

ul.li: Support for PNG, JPG, JPEG, TIFF, WEBP, AVIF, PDF, SVG, and BMP input formats
Real-time preview of your source images

description.p: The application supports the following output configuration details:

ul.li: Support for PNG, WEBP, and SVG output formats
Single tool for desktop and webapp image creation
Convert images to PNG, WEBP, or SVG formats

description.p: Added support for WEBP output format.
Initial release with support for multiple formats and dark theme.
